goUpload.title: Genshin Optimizer format
goUpload.migrate: Database will be migrated to a newer version. Please consider re-downloading the database after import.
goUpload.deleteDatabasePrompt: Are you sure you want to replace your database? All existing characters and artifacts will be deleted.

tooltip.partial: <0>Full Import</0><1>Assume the import to be the full inventory. Artifacts/weapons in GO that doesnt exist in the import are deleted.</1><2>Partial Import</2><3>Assume the import is a partial inventory. Artifacts/weapons are updated/deduplicated(depending on setting), but not deleted.</3>
tooltip.disjoint: <0>Merge Import</0><1>Find upgrade/duplicates in the GO inventory and merge the import into GO.</1><2>Disjoint Import</2><3>Assume the import does not have any upgrades/duplicates, the import is merged into GO without upgrade/duplicate detection.</3>
